text: Only Lovers Left Alive is a 2013 British German French Greek romantic fantasy drama movie directed by Jim Jarmusch and starring Tilda Swinton, Tom Hiddleston, Mia Wasikowska, John Hurt, Jeffrey Wright, Anton Yelchin, Yasmine Hamdan. ==Other websites== * Category:2013 fantasy movies Category:2013 romantic drama movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:German romance movies Category:German fantasy movies Category:German drama movies Category:French romance movies Category:French fantasy movies Category:French drama movies Category:Greek movies Category:Movies directed by Jim Jarmusch
title: Only Lovers Left Alive
